system.description:
Walking the line between a wizard’s practical mastery of the arcane and a scholar’s theoretical dabblings, a sage knows more about magic than perhaps any other who walks the world.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your Intelligence score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain the Academic option for @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.szxgzc4zmt9zam9f]{Scholarly Excellence} if you do not already have it.  If you do, you gain a different Scholarly Excellence option of your choice.
  • Any spells you replicate using a Scholarly Discovery by expending a hit die and/or inspiration you may also cast using a spell slot if you have a spell slot of high enough level.  These spells count as Scholar spells known for you.
system.prerequisite: 3 Levels in Scholar (Hedge Mage archetype, 3 Levels in Wizard
